document.full_text: a u.s. judge monday chastised roger clemens and his former trainer brian mcnamee for coming "precariously close" to violating a gag order for recent comments about the upcoming perjury trial of the former pitching star.
document.title: judge raps roger clemens, trainer brian mcnamee for remarks
lines_and_colors: a u.s. judge monday chastised roger clemens and his former trainer brian mcnamee for coming "precariously close" to violating a gag order for recent comments about the upcoming perjury trial of the former pitching star.
